mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET LOCK_UNTIL = TO_DATE(#{lockUntil}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = 5 WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = 0, LOCK_UNTIL = NULL WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, FULL_NAME, PASSWORD, PROVIDER, ROLE, CREATED_AT, RESET_TOKEN, TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT, ACCOUNT_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{fullName}, #{password}, #{provider}, #{role}, SYSDATE, #{resetToken}, TO_DATE(#{tokenExpireAt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'WAITING_VERIFY' )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, FULL_NAME, PASSWORD, PROVIDER, ROLE, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_AT, LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT, TO_CHAR(LOCK_UNTIL, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOCK_UNTIL, RESET_TOKEN, TO_CHAR(TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT, ACCOUNT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(SUSPEND_UNTIL, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SUSPEND_UNTIL, IS_SUSPENDED, SUSPEND_REASON FROM USER_INFO WHERE RESET_TOKEN = #{token}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET ACCOUNT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE', RESET_TOKEN = NULL, TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT = NULL WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET RESET_TOKEN = #{resetToken}, TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT = TO_DATE(#{tokenExpireAt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET PASSWORD = #{password}, RESET_TOKEN = NULL, TOKEN_EXPIRE_AT = NULL WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( EMAIL, FULL_NAME, PROVIDER, ROLE, CREATED_AT, ACCOUNT_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{fullName}, #{provider}, 'USER', SYSDATE, 'ACTIVE' )
mapper.select: SELECT F.STOCK_CODE, S.STOCK_NAME, S.PRICE, S.CHANGE_RATE, F.MEMO, S.INDUSTRY FROM USER_FAVORITE_STOCK F JOIN STOCK_INFO S ON F.STOCK_CODE = S.STOCK_CODE WHERE F.EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY F.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT F.NEWS_ID, N.TITLE AS newsTitle, N.URL AS newsUrl, TO_CHAR(N.NEWS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS newsDate, F.IS_READ AS isRead, F.MEMO as memo FROM USER_FAVORITE_NEWS F JOIN STOCK_NEWS N ON F.NEWS_ID = N.NEWS_ID WHERE F.EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY F.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_FAVORITE_STOCK WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode}
DELETE FROM USER_FAVORITE_NEWS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND NEWS_ID = #{newsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET IS_SUSPENDED = 'N', SUSPEND_UNTIL = NULL, SUSPEND_REASON = NULL WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
